text:
Calculator help: On the TI, factorial is [2nd] [x!] (above the multiplication sign). On the
HP, factorial is [g] [n!). To compute 4! on the TI, enter [4][2nd] [x!] = 24. On the HP,
press [4][ENTER][g][n!).
Example: Labeling
Consider a portfolio consisting of eight stocks. Your goal is to designate four of the
stocks as "long-term holds,” three of the stocks as “short-term holds,” and one stock
as “sell." How many ways can these eight stocks be labeled?
